# 8.0 Docs

> Documentation for 8.0 Docs.

*Topics available: 1*

- [Breaking change: IntPtr no longer used for function pointer types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/reflection/8.0/function-pointer-reflection.md): Learn about a breaking change in .NET 8 SDK where System.Reflection uses a System.Type instance to represent a function pointer.
